storyInfo: Perfumer is planning to remodel the Convalescent Garden, and wants to put Podenco in charge of it. However, after noticing Podenco falling short, Perfumer resolves to work alongside her.

attributes.content: Early morning
Rhodes Island Dormitories
Perfumer's Dormitory
(That should make for enough space.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (For the output...)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (I'll probably need to tweak the cultivation method for this section.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (And then here...)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Miss Lena, I've got reports for you!
Hmm? Is that Podenco? Come right in.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Good morning, Miss Lena.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Good morning, Podenco.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Here's the inventory list you wanted, and the completed order form.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (Inventory figures all seem to line up.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (Order information is crystal clear, too, and the budget attached... seems alright.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (There's a problem or two in plain sight, though. I wonder if she'll notice.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You've done very well, handling all this documenting all by yourself.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: It feels very simple to do, compared to caring for the plants.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Only...
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: (She noticed?)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Mmm... it caught my eye.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Orders and appointments, more and more are coming in lately... A little extra work's okay, and I can cope if I sleep a bit later, but..
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: We just don't have enough raw material.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Right, the Garden flora's output can't keep up anymore.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: If we keep burning through them our current rate, we'll be out of fresh flowers to make things in a month.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Mm-hmm.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: If we can, I'd like to apply to purchase a few plants. That way, we can buy ourselves a little time while we think of a solution.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Do you think that would be okay, Miss?
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Hmm. What to do?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Miss, why are you still so calm? The flowers are going to run out, aren't they?!
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Heheh, don't worry. We'll find a way.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Here, come sit. Have a cup of tea, and take a breather.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: It just so happens I have a few questions I'd like your opinion on.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Oh, if you really say so, Miss...
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Let me ask. With Rhodes Island roving all over Terra year-round, do you have a stable supplier to sell to you?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: If you leave it in Logistics's hands, they can probably work something out.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: But we can't trouble them with everything. There's always more important things for them to eke out channels and spend their funds on, isn't that right?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: If the Logistics Department's Operators made contact with a supplier, but the other side couldn't meet our requirements, what then?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You have to consider, we painstakingly assembled the Garden's plantlife from across Terra. A certain few of our plants are even special kinds not permitted to be bought or sold.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: If we made an order, but they had no way of fulfilling our needs, what then?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Then maybe we can purchase the more common ones, free up some space, and plant all rare flowers?
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Like the rugosa roses, maybe? What do you think?
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: (Pfft. There's a silly idea I had as well.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You're right, they're the flower we use the most of, and the easiest to purchase at that.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Podenco, do you still remember the roses you planted where you grew up?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Mm-hm!
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Then do you feel any particular difference between the roses back home, and the ones in the Garden?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: The rugosas back home had a lighter kind of aroma. It was less of a flower and more like one of our local fruits, really.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: The ones here have a much stronger fragrance, but they don't make your nose wrinkle either. They're really nice-smelling, Miss.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: See, both are rugosa roses all the same, yet they're so different. How could we make sure flowers from a supplier have the same qualities as the ones we grow here?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: We could certainly treat those flowers like our own in use, but in the off-chance an Operator feels unwell using our goods because of that minute change in ingredients, I would be betraying the Doctor's trust.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Not to mention, despite being roses, some varieties aren't easy to purchase.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Do you still remember the ones growing in the freezer compartment?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: They might be roses still, but their nature, and their medicinal nature above all, is very different from roses growing on the farms. Because they only grow in the northern tundras of Ursus, and the Medical Department specially entrusted me with their cultivation.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I could never just freeze any rose I fancied and hand it over to Dr. Kal'tsit, could I?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Miss, I didn't think about any of this...
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Oh, it's quite alright.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You've thought through a great deal already. You should be proud.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Miss Lena, the way it sounds, you must have a plan. You can tell me.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: What to do indeed~
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Well, then, let's shutter the Convalescent Garden.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Miss Lena, you can't even consider closing down!
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: I've had a clear mind about it the entire time.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Lean in here a little, take a look at this.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: This is—?
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: The Convalescent Garden remodeling plan.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I've already discussed it with the Doctor, who's agreed to clear the neighboring storehouse and incorporate it into the Garden entirely.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: This way, we can have more space for planting, provide an area for guests to relax, set up a dedicated aromatherapy room, and your little greenhouse can even get a fix-up alongside.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Can I expand mine too?!
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: That's wonderful!
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Moreover, I'm preparing to move my own dormitory in there.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You're going to live in the Garden?
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: It takes too much time to get there from the dormitories, after all. So I thought to myself, I might as well just live there. Part of the research room will be merged with my own room.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: This way, I can actually save on quite a bit of space.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: The thing is—
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: The workload will be a bit too much, for just us two alone.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: It just so happens we'll have much more space to build an even larger greenhouse. Could I trouble you to find an Operator for the task, and bring them over for me?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: We'll need someone good with botany and greenhouse construction, right?
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Then I'll go and find someone now. When I do, I'll get in touch with you, Miss.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Mmm, take care on your way.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hm-hmm, she's grown a little more every day I see her.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Perhaps this time, I'll be able to just sit back and supervise?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Really, that Miss Kal'tsit. I grumble to her and mention the poor plant quality, and she hands the whole Convalescent Garden straight off onto my back.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Planning, measuring, cultivation, every last little thing, left for me to sort out on my own...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: And I, *sigh*... did exactly as she told, learning as I set things up...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: At least I could grow some flowers, and give something or other to all of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: And now...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hmm, now I can have Podenco build some strength too.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'll just get everything set up, sit on the sidelines, and give myself a little holiday of sorts.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Phew... ha...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Let's have some tea and rest...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Tea bags... tea bags...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Midday
Rhodes Island Dormitories
Perfumer's Dormitory
(This area shouldn't need any more alterations.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (I'm a little peckish now.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I wonder what to eat today?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'm even hallucinating the smell of food.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hold on, is this—?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (*sniff* *sniff*)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: How come I've never smelt any flower like this aboard the Island before?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Just gimme a liiiiittle bit, just a tiny patch, and things'll be gold.
All my little Metal Crabs are starting to grow up, and the new generation's gonna come into the world pretty soon too, so, for the sake of new life, hand me some space and you'll be a winner.
If I don't have enough farm room, I'll raise them in the dorms, seriously. I mean, they're not gonna cause a ruckus, but I don't think all the nice Misses living there are gonna be happy.
Augh, can't you just be a little flexible?! Ugh, I'm done with you. I'll find someone else!
You seem to be dealing with something or other. Is there anything I can help with?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Ah, afternoon. You're—?
I'm Lena, the Perfumer. I'm responsible for managing the Convalescent Garden and tending to the plants.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Nice to meet you, Lena. I'm Beanstalk.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: It's about lunchtime right now. If it's convenient for you, perhaps we can eat together? We can chat over our food that way.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Huh, really? It just so happens I'm a little hungry too.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: So, you specialize in Metal Crab farming, is that right?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Yep. They're all my sweet little darlings.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: They're not like those wild Metal Crabs. They're tame and obedient. Some of them love people more than anything.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Like little Pea here.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Blinks)
attributes.name: Peacake

attributes.content: May I—pet it?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Go right ahead. Pea's not scared of strangers.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (It's not aggressive one bit. Well, then.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (And the fragrance is definitely coming from the flowers on top of its head.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (I've never scented this before. Perhaps it's an uncommon plant species?)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (It's not heavy, but it has staying power, and its aroma is very stable too.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (It might not be bad as a base fragrance.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (As for medicinal value, that'd have to wait until harvesting and further analysis.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: What'cha frozen there for, Miss Lena? What's on your mind?
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Ah, I'm very sorry about that. Just a bout of occupational disease.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Pea's scent is very pleasant, I have to say.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Really? Thank you, that's an amazing opinion to get from an expert!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: If I might be so bold to ask, would I be allowed to pick the flower on Pea's head?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Go right on.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: They snip them off each other or eat them when they're all playing together, you know, but they grow back real fast.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: (Is it a stable, symbiotic sort of plant? How interesting.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (Perhaps I could ask and see if Beanstalk would help me 'plant' some?)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (I've been wanting to keep a few docile animals in the Garden, but just couldn't ever find a suitable breed.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (This might just be my chance.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Well, then. Could you hear out a request of mine?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'm all ears.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: I'm actually awfully interested in the plants on these little friends' heads.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: These flowers are exceptionally unique. This is my first time ever seeing them.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: If we worked on a specific application for them, I can guarantee they'd be very precious as a material.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I just so happened to overhear your chat with the Logistics Operator. You're worrying over cultivation space as well, aren't you?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'm thinking I could give you some room to settle your little friends down in.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: For real?!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: For real, indeed. If this works out, I can only presume everyone will reap the rewards.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: As long as these little ones are kept and raised well, and they don't scamper all about in the greenhouse.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: At appropriate times, they'd interact with Operators coming to the Garden too.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: They're all personally raised by me, and they're not hostile with people. You've got no worries.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Thank you for your guarantee. It's a great reassurance.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: As for a contract, I'll leave drawing that up to you, if that's fine. We can talk over any associated expenditures and costs when the time comes.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: *Bzzzzzt*—
I'm sorry, that's my terminal.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Mhmm, it's me.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You've found somebody? Good, that's wonderful. Thank you so much.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'll come over right now.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Alright. See you in a moment.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: *Bzzzt*
Apologies, Beanstalk, but there's a thing or two that needs me. I'll be heading off first.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: This is my card. If you have the contract ready, you can contact me whenever.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Sounds good, Lena.
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: Thanks a million! You're a real good one, you know!
attributes.name: Beanstalk

attributes.content: You can find good ones anywhere. You'll only find someone as caring and sisterly as me right here!
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: See you later~
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Landship
Outside the Convalescent Garden
Miss, I'm over here!
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Podenco, where's your Operator?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Why do I only see—a small tractor?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Bagpipe's behind it. She'll come over just in a moment.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Bagpipe, Bagpipe!
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Ah! There you are!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Been a long time, Perfumer!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I brought some soil over here for Podenco.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Already got all the ratios set up like you'd best want 'em. I can kick things off whenever, just waitin' for you to open up the door.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Gave some of it a grindin' down after I noticed the grain was a bit too coarse, so now that should make it easier some to mix.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: (She ground down—volcanic rock?)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Miss Lena, what's wrong? You look a little pale. Do you feel unwell, maybe?
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Bagpipe, could I bother you just a second?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Aye, go ahead. I'll help however as long as I can.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Then I'd like you, please, to take the soil you mixed and separate it.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: You've. Mixed. It. Wrong.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: So sorry! I'm sorry! I thought you were mixin' the soil for flowers before you scattered it around the big shed!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Miss, please don't be upset—I—I wasn't aware as well, I'm terribly sorry!
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Ha...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (Oh, so be it. I can't blame them. After all, I've done much stupider things...)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (I did once take an engineering vehicle and floor it all the way until I bumped into the cafeteria...)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (So this is Bagpipe. She's very familiar with agriculture, that's true. She should be able to help out.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (Let's ask her to.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (After I'm done with a few choice angry words.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Bagpipe, please, next time, never pull this sort of practical joke again.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Oh, I wasn't...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Growing flowers in the Garden and growing vegetables in plots are very unalike. We're not trying to plant bulk monocultures in a finite space here, please understand that.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Um, ohh... got it...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: We can't plant flowers in this soil now. Let's just use it for the farm's base layer when the time comes.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: The farm?
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Mmm, we're amending our refurbishment plans a little, since I'd like to raise some of Beanstalk's little Metal Crabs. We can go over it in more detail once we head back.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: If you don't need me, I'll just be headin' home now...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Mhmm, that's fine. Drive the tractor away first.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Got it...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: After all, we haven't even started today, so we won't need it.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Store the mixed soil at your place, since for now we don't have anywhere to dump it.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Once you're done, come drop by my dormitory room. There's still plenty I'll need to trouble you with.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Can I still, y'know, help out?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You're not cross with me?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I am cross. Of course I'm cross.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: But even if I'm cross, we still have to get things done.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Or are you saying you're not ready to help us?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Course I am!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Awww, bless you, Nena, you're a sweetheart!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: If you wouldn't mind, please call me Lena...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I think Nena sounds a little cuter, though.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: We've still got plenty of work to do today, so let's head back for now, Podenco.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: And move fast, Bagpipe. There's still a good deal of that work I need to entrust you with.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Don't try and dodge the subject.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I see how it is, alright! I'll be right there!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Dormitories
Perfumer's Dormitory
I'll leave planning the refurbished area to you. We might have more room to grow our plants, but we'll still want to save as much space as we can.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: We'll hand this section over to Beanstalk for farm use. I'll leave regularly picking those symbiotic flowers of theirs up to you too.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: And the section along the side—that'll be my new residence, then.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: The leftover materials from building the greenhouse will be enough for me. There'll be no need to procure anything special.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: That's the rough state of things.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Nena, I'm here!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Come in...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I've got everythin' all prepared already. Tell me just what you need me for!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'd like to leave all the definitive build details tasked to you.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Gettin' your big shed set up? I'm no stranger to that.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'll also need you to help get in touch with Rhodes Island's construction team.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Even less of a problem. I know all the Operators in charge of repair works up by the agriculture area.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Just leave it all to us, Miss Lena!
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: (If I could actually leave it all up to you two, that'd be marvelous...)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: The Convalescent Garden will be closed while refurbishment is ongoing. I'll be responsible for growing and daily care of the plants in the original Garden, and providing continued aromatherapy to Operators who depend on it like Miss Pasbelletti.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Construction time is limited to a month. I think we should be able to complete refurbishments in around twenty-five days.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Podenco, could I ask you to repeat what tasks I just allocated to you?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Right, Miss. I need to plan out the refurbished area, and make some room for your new dormitory and Beanstalk's farm.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Mhmm, and then?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Then?
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: What material sheets to use, how to partition the plants, how to harvest Beanstalk's little Metal Crab flowers.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Have you considered any of those yet?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: (It seems like she still hasn't decided.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (I can't just toss her all alone into her work. I'll still need to give her some directions.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (Our deadline's very tight this go round. We don't have any time for her to take things slowly.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: (A holiday... that'll have to wait after all.)
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Don't worry. Just in case, I was asking.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'll be in the Garden all throughout refurbishment, so if there's anything here or there you don't understand, you can come and ask me.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I'll be moving my things over bit by bit from this dormitory, so it all works out.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: That should be more or less it. Do any of you have any questions?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I always thought you only knew flowers, Nena, but you've got your head wrapped around so much.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: It takes doing these things yourself, before you understand how they should be done.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: So, you mean, way back then, everythin' in the Garden was all your work?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Mhmm.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: There's always some things other people can't help with, things you can only really sort out yourself.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I thought you would be the type to order other people to work, Miss.
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: How would I order anyone without having personally done it before...
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Our every drop of sweat now is the experience we'll direct others with in the future. Do your best.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: I hope you'll learn successfully enough, and set up your own independent work.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Ideally, even take on an apprentice.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Miss, there's no way I could...
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: When we have new Operators assigned to the Garden in future, you'll be their senior, and come that time, it'll be your responsibility to teach them.
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Then I'll truly be able to leave the work to you, and I can sit back and give orders~
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Miss Lena~~
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: For now, just answer those few questions for me, okay?
attributes.name: Perfumer

attributes.content: Ahh—
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Er, um, just let me think a little more...
attributes.name: Podenco

attributes.content: Miss~
attributes.name: Podenco
